typeProperties.script:

		bowling_t20s_bbi as string,
		bowling_t20s_bbm as string,
		bowling_t20s_ave as string,
		bowling_t20s_econ as string,
		bowling_t20s_sr as string,
		bowling_t20s_4w as string,
		bowling_t20s_5w as string,
		bowling_t20s_10 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 20,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ReadPlayerRecord
ReadPlayerRecord split(equals(country,'India'),
	disjoint: true) ~> SplitIndianPlayer@(IndianPlayer, OtherPlayer)
SplitIndianPlayer@IndianPlayer sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['IndianPlayer'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> WriteExcelFile
